data.title: Paramount International
data.meta_description:
Paramount International | 107,196 followers on LinkedIn. Reaching New Heights  | Welcome to Paramount’s International Markets.

We’ve been cultivating culture, telling stories, and engaging audiences for over a century across the globe.

We’re a leading media and entertainment company that creates premium content and experiences for audiences worldwide.
data.text:
Welcome to Paramount’s International Markets. We’ve been cultivating culture, telling stories, and engaging audiences for over a century across the globe. We’re a leading media and entertainment company that creates premium content and experiences for audiences worldwide. Driven by iconic studios, networks, and streaming services, Paramount's consumer brands include CBS, Showtime Networks, Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon, MTV, Comedy Central, BET, Paramount+, Pluto TV, Telefé, Chanel 5, Chilevision and Network 10, among others. With this portfolio, we are TV audiences' leaders in Australia, Chile, Argentina, and the UK. We are present in bringing entertainment, production, distribution, and advertising solutions around Argentina, Chile, Brazil, Mexico, United States, United Kingdom, Spain, France, Germany, Netherlands, Italy, Hungary, Sweden, Israel, South Africa, Russia, China, Singapore, Japan, Australia, and Poland. We boast of one of the industry's most important and extensive libraries of TV and film titles. But this is much more than you would think. We’ve been accompanying different generations for years, being part of the entertainment history and leaving a mark with iconic titles of timeless value such as Titanic or The Godfather, bringing together youth and adult memories with new launches such as Top Gun, and seeing the youngest grow up with animation series like Sponge Bob SquarePants or PAW Patrol. We want to stay by your side and continue to be part of your memories, offering the best entertainment and working every day to keep being a benchmark. This is what we do: we make feel emotions, inform, and inspire, reaching people and connecting with them. This is our mission: to unleash the power of content. Want to do this? Start your story with us! We’ve got the place for you to put your talent to work. See our opportunities at www.paramount.com/careers/experienced. For more information about us, visit our company’s website at www.paramount.com.

Website

https://www.paramount.com/careers/experienced
